(select sum(p_price2) from payment_lecture_view2
WHERE DATE(p_date) >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '${year}-${month}-01') AND

) as sumtotal ,

) as refundtotal from payment_lecture_view2

DATE(p_date) <= DATE('${year}-${month}-31')
where u_id = #{u_id}
